com.linagora.ldap

Class Jetel2LdapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linagora.ldap.Jetel2LdapData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Jetel2LdapData.Jetel2LdapByte, Jetel2LdapData.Jetel2LdapString

    public abstract class Jetel2LdapData
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is a mapping utilities between LDAP data and Jetel internal data representation.
    Since:
    august 2006

        protected java.lang.String multiSeparator
